itemDisplayName: Windows Server 2016 Docker Swarm with Autoscale
description: Deploys a Windows Server 2016 Docker Swarm. The VMSS PowerShell DSC Extension is leveraged to do the Docker install and swarm initialization
summary: Deploys a Windows Server 2016 Docker Swarm. The VMSS PowerShell DSC Extension is leveraged to do the Docker install and swarm initialization
